products.description: FLEXI-CLEAR YANKAUER HANDLE The Flexi-Clear Yankauer Handle is mainly used for suction therapy in surgical operation, which belongs to the part of the surgical suction assembled. Available as a set, pre-attached to 2 or 3 metre tubes. These instru- ments are single use and sterile. Available in various tip styles: Mini fine super, Short mini super, Maxi super and Maxi tip. · Provide suction flexibility with clarity and visualization · Rigid tip or flexible tip for different application · Non-breakable flexible suction instrument · Smooth inner lumen, come in various sizes & tip options · Double sterile packaging in individual peel pouches 12FR 12FR 15FR 15FR 15FR 18FR 18FR 22FR 22FR 28FR 28FR Mini fine super tip with two lateral eyes, with control vent Mini fine super tip with two lateral eyes, without control vent Short mini super tip with no lateral eyes, with control vent Short mini super tip with no lateral eyes, without control vent Short mini super tip with two lateral eyes, without control vent Midi super tip with six lateral eyes, with control vent Midi super tip with six lateral eyes, without control vent Maxi super tip with six lateral eyes, with control vent Maxi super tip with six lateral eyes, without control vent Maxi plus tip with four lateral eyes, with control vent Maxi plus tip with four lateral eyes, without control vent SUCTION DEVICES 01 02 SUCTION DEVICES 18FR 18FR 18FR 18FR 18FR 18FR Atraumatic tip, short soft blue, with control vent Atraumatic tip, short soft blue, without control vent Atraumatic tip, short rigid green, with control Atraumatic tip, short rigid green, without control vent Atraumatic tip, long soft green, with control vent Atraumatic tip, long soft green, without control vent
features: Provide suction flexibility with clarity and visualization

products.description: Short Soft Short Rigid Long Soft 03 SUCTION DEVICES

Suction Handles deliver performance and maneuverability. Each Yankauer tip comes with large crush resistant star lumen tubing for maximum suction performance and the advantage of continuous, large flow paths to prevent clogging. · Non-vented / Vented · One-piece design, made from a blend of clear, shatterproof and non-metamorphosed plastic · Edges are smooth · Smooth and uniform inner surface for rapid evacuation, fit securely on all types of tube · Single use only · Sterile
features: One-piece design, made from a blend of clear, shatterproof and non-metamorphosed plastic
Smooth and uniform inner surface for rapid evacuation, fit securely on all types of tube

Plain Tip For general suction of fluids and blood during open surgery. Flattened Tip For suctioning between nerves and muscle tissue. Atraumatic Tip For operations involving delicate tissue where gentle suction is required. Tapered Tip For neurological, cosmetic, or other operations where space is limited and to increase accuracy of suctioning. Tapered Tip with Relieving Eyes For increased accuracy and atraumatic surgical suction when space is limited. products.description: Flexible or Rigid sump sucker with removable inner suction probe. Specifically for abdominal surgery, reducing trauma to surrounding tissues. · Constructed from a shatter-resistant plastic · Specially designed to evacuate pooled blood, fluid or debris during deep abdominal surgeries or cesarean suction · Perforated outer sheath for rapid evacuation of pooled blood and fluid · Removable sheath options are available · Features 3 multi-purpose positions · Universal connector easily connects to a variety of suction tubing sizes · Sterile, single patient use Flexible sheath, curved Flexible sheath Rigid sheath with 132 eyes for rapid suction X-ray visible and removable sheath Extra wide lumen for efficient suction during operations causing profuse bleeding Poole (X-ray visible) with recessed holes for abdominal surgery and for extraction of blood and secretions with free sediment 11 SUCTION DEVICES
features: Specially designed to evacuate pooled blood, fluid or debris during deep abdominal surgeries or cesarean
Perforated outer sheath for rapid evacuation of pooled blood and fluid

products.description: Easyflow filtered suction system for orthopedic surgery. Orthopedic Suction Set with filter keeps the operative area visible, clean and clear. The special filter built into the handle automatically traps solid and can be exchanged in a matter of seconds when filled. Increased filter capacity makes the suction set ideal for hip arthroplasty and other procedures that produce a large amount of debris. products.description: Connector 6 in 1 straight Connector Y 1/4" 3/8"connector fits tubing from 5/16" to 7/16 (8-11mm). 3/8"connector is used to join two sections of 3/8"(10mm) tubing. “T” Tubing Connector 6-in-1 “Y” Tubing Connector 5-in-1 "Straight" Tubing Connector SIMS Connector / Irrigation Nozzle “T” Tubing Connector Joins three sections of tubing. Five steps on each leg provides connections of any size tubing from 5 to 11mm (3/16” to 7/16”). 6-in-1 “Y” Tubing Connector Tapered legs fit six sizes of tubing, from 6mm to 15mm (1/4” to 9/16”). 5-in-1 "Straight" Tubing Connector Lightweight plastic connectors allow for multiple pieces of tubing to be joined together. SIMS Connector / Irrigation Nozzle Nozzle fits any size tubing from 3 to 6mm (1/8” to 1/4” in seven size increments.
